sentences: Kõik on korras, meil on kõik terve.
See laps on täiesti terve ja energiline.
context: The word 'tervet' is the partitive singular form of the Estonian adjective 'terve'. It means healthy, sound, whole or well. In its partitive singular form, it's often used in expressions like 'tere tulemast tervet' (welcome/healthy arrival) as a greeting. The base form 'terve' describes something being healthy or whole in nature.
